Package pepse.world.trees

Class Tree

java.lang.Object
pepse.world.trees.Tree
public class Tree extends Object
Class for creating trees Trees are created in a range of x values The trees are created at random positions

    • Tree

      public Tree(danogl.util.Vector2 trunkLoc, int height, BiConsumer<Fruit,danogl.GameObject> onCollisionFruit, Observer observer, BiConsumer<danogl.GameObject,Integer> remove, BiConsumer<danogl.GameObject,Integer> add)
      Creates the tree object The tree object is a trunk with leafs and fruits
      Parameters:
      trunkLoc - the location of the trunk
      height - the height of the tree
      onCollisionFruit - the function that is called when a fruit collides with an object
      observer - the observer object
      remove - the function that removes an object from the game
      add - the function that adds an object to the game
